text: Nikuti ŵape ilagasyo achinakunaku ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, kwisa soni ŵakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu) ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵaakun’ganichisyaga Allah nganisyo syangalumbana, pa ŵanganyao pana mpupulusi wakusakala, soni Allah ŵakasilichile, ŵalwesile, ni ŵalinganyichisye Jahannama, kaje kusakala malo gakuwujila gakwe
